root: ^Is that a massive painting? It’s so… real looking...
^I’m sort of the ‘keeper’ of this place.
^They call me Benny The Roomkeep. Pleasure to meet you Cat.
^Benny. But Bunny works too so it’s alright! So, are you the one who will bring the constellation pieces together?
^But… you are the first one I have seen here in a long while. That’s why yo-
^Listen, I don’t want to do any of your bouncy work at all. So could you let me be?”
^Bouncy work? Let you be? Ooooh cat, cat… Cat. Most who end up here strive to complete the Constellation… and yet, you are refuse. What is it? Why don’t you want to?
^I didn’t want to end up here!
^And now I am stuck wherever this place is. So if this “constellation” won’t help me to get out of here, I won’t help “it” either.
^Oh Cat, you don’t want to end up like the ones before you.
^The path always goes forward. As should you.
^The ones before me? What happened to them?
^They stayed. Stagnant. Frozen. Wherever they could. Not willing to go forwards at points. Just to be forgotten.
^Forgotten? What? I don’t… I don’t want to be forgotten.
^...Tell me what I need to do.
^You need to go forward. Let the pieces guide your way.
